org.openstreetmap.osm.io
Class FileLoader

java.lang.Object
  org.openstreetmap.osm.io.FileLoader

public class FileLoader
extends java.lang.Object

This class exists to make loading an OpenStreetMap-file via program-code easier. It wraps the existing functionality in Osmosis.

Author:
Marcus Wolschon
